column3: Department of Civil, Environmental & Geomatic Engineering
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe programme focuses on the major practical and theoretical applications in banking and the most innovative aspects of digital finance. The programme emphasises the analytical foundation of finance and financial products, focusing on theory and methods and making extensive use of relevant practical applications.About this degreeThe primary objective of our Banking and Digital Finance MSc is to provide students with the tools and skills to gain an in-depth understanding of the finance and banking industry. The programme is highly applied and the teaching is research-driven, allowing our students to gain access to the most innovative aspects of digital finance.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
